Actions.Name: Storm Hammer
Actions.Description: At the start of the round, the [name] slams a hammer of lightning into a small blast area, creating a terrain effect in that space. Foes in the area are weakened+, and the area has Rampart. At the end of the round, the hammer is recalled. All foes in the area, and all foes adjacent to the [name] take 4 damage. If foes are both in the area and adjacent to the [name], they take damage twice.

Actions.Name: Mighty Smite
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage to weakened or slashed foes.

Combo.Name: Thunderfury
Combo.Effects: Deals bonus damage to attack target per status or allied mark they are affected by. If they are affected by three or more, they are stunned.

Actions.Name: Berserkgang
Actions.Description: A foe in range must save or gain hatred of the [name]. On a successful save, they are weakened. If the target or [name] is bloodied, they gain +1 curse on this save.

Actions.Name: Storm Cunning
Actions.Description: Swap places with an ally in range, removing and placing both characters. Bloodied characters gain 3 vigor.

Actions.Name: Primal Spark
Actions.Description: A foe in range takes 2 divine damage.

Actions.Name: Sturmreiten
Actions.Description: The [name] flies 4 with phasing, and is intangible while flying. All characters they pass through take 2 damage.
